title: Textile, "Montana", 1986
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: Screen printed using 11 rotary screens on plain weave foundation.
inscribed: Along each side, " MONTANA By EDDIE SQUIRES For The Collection DESIGNER'S CHOICE II Copyright (symbol) MCMLXXXVI By Warner ons Limited (arrow) Top".
dimensions:
Warp: 132cm (52in.). Weft: 141cm (55 1/2in.) Both selvedges present.
Pattern: Height of repeat:64cm  (25 1/4in).
description: A fractured and fragmented design as of a mosaic made of broken pottery and tiles. Principally blue and green. Width of pattern is 54 inches leaving a margin at both sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Montana", 1986.
1986. Medium: cotton
Technique: Screen printed using 11 rotary screens on plain weave foundation.. Gift of Eddie Squires. 1992-3-18.
